    • setCrewMalus

      public void setCrewMalus(int crewMalus)
      Sets the penalty value for the crew, which may represent the negative impact or disadvantage applied in the game scenario where crew members are involved.
      Parameters:
      crewMalus - the penalty value to be set for the crew. This value determines how the crew's performance or effect is negatively influenced during gameplay.

    • setStepsBack

      public void setStepsBack(int stepsBack)
      Sets the number of steps the player is required to move back during the AbandonedShip card's play.
      Parameters:
      stepsBack - the number of steps to move back; must be a non-negative integer.

    • play

      public void play(PlayerChoicesDataStructure playerChoices) throws UnknownStateException
      Executes the actions based on the current state of the game and the choices made by the player.
      Specified by:
      play in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      playerChoices - the data structure containing the choices made by the current player, such as whether the player wants to visit or which crew members to remove.
      Throws:
      UnknownStateException - if the game is in an unknown or unsupported state.
